content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Aug 09 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar Saturday chaired a meeting to review Ministry of Foreign Affairs' initiatives introduced in the year 2024 under his guidance to reform visa processes at Pakistan missions abroad. The DPM/FM reviewed progress and directed further measures to streamline procedures, enhance transparency, improve efficiency, and ensure fast-track visa issuance, particularly for the Pakistani diaspora, including investors and the business community, Foreign Office spokesperson said in a press release.
